title: Plato DVD Ripper Professional-serial incl
description:
Plato DVD Ripper Professional - Rip dvd to avi, ipod, psp, mpeg, zune, wmv, flv video... 


  Plato DVD Ripper Professional is an all-in-one dvd rip software , which helps to rip dvd movies to avi , divx, mpeg, Apple iPod, iPhone, Apple TV MP4 file, Youtube FLV file, Sony PSP MP4, PS3 Video, Microsoft Zune,WMV, Cellphone 3GP video , Realmedia video and so on. So powerful It is! 

It is simple and easy to use . Just 3 steps : (1) Open dvd movie, then it would automatically fast forward to dvd main movie (2) select dvd audio track , subtitle or seek to specified position (3) select output video format and press "convert" to start ripping dvd.
